title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
June 25, 2019
On Monday, June 24, 2019, the President signed into law:S. 1379, the “Pandemic and All-Hazards Preparedness and Advancing Innovation Act of 2019,” which reauthorizes and modifies programs related to public health emergency preparedness and response.
